content.description: Starts on lowest rail as a sit then reaches up to obvious small crimper then throw up right to good crimp at large pocket at next rail.  Use small crimps to get to large rail (crux)up and left then climb straight up through v3ish topout moves.
content.protection: Lots of pads or top rope using tree's up top to anchor.  Be careful of falling too far back from top due to tree nearby
content.location: Left most line on the Gun Locker Wall.  Starts as a sit at steepest part on obvious ledges at 1st seam.  Down climb gully that is about 20ft to the right if you are facing the wall.

content.description: Shoot to Kill starts on bad edges at the first seam then go up to two pockets at next seam.  From pockets reach high to next rail then prepare for slopey pinches and bad downward leaning edges for a balancey reach to a flat sloper then a better pinch.  High crux can lead to big falls, bring lots of pads or work on toprope if you are concerned.
content.protection: Many pads, easy to work on TR.  Clean the holds before you commit.
content.location: Left center most line at the Gun Locker Wall.  Do not climb into crack on the right, that is a different (easier) line.  Climb stays on face till tops out.

content.description: 23+ ft east facing wall of thin to larger holds on good Kelly sandstone.  This wall gets sun till noon then starts to cool down more the longer you are there.
